item.title: Ukraine’s president and Poland’s prime minister have called it “genocide”. Joe Biden, America’s president, said what had happened in Bucha was a war crime and that Vladimir Putin, Russia’s president, should face an international tribunal for it https://t.co/x4ehsRVrsa

“They made us take our clothes off, lie face down, and then they searched our telephones and bodies for symbols and tattoos.” A survivor of a summary execution in Bucha tells us what happened https://t.co/2hcnJY9TEJ

The West has presented a united front against the invasion of Ukraine. But many people live in countries sympathetic to Russia
